1370: Marcibilia was born in Uterechse straet in 1370.
Got married to Ludingus at age 22 in 1370.
Gave birth to Godino in 1370 at age 22.
1373: Gave birth to Diewiven in 1373 at age 25.
1375: Gave birth to Nannen in 1375 at age 27.
1377: Gave birth to Gisele in 1377 at age 29.
1380: Gave birth to Reynildis in 1380 at age 32.
1382: Lost daughter Liedelde when Liedelde was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Liedelde in 1382 at age 34.
1384: Gave birth to Hilduardis in 1384 at age 36.
